page.title: 11INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: The Library was opened in August 1966. It has a book stock of 27,000. It has a room devoted to local history. The membership is estimated at 10,000,some members do not live here but work on the Island. The Library displays work by a number of different groups. At this time it is booked up until the end of 1985 with people wanting to show off their specialities. It runs a pre-school activities service, during the week and has facilities for school classes to come and work. We have a Tourist Information building on the Seafront near Eastoke Corner. The hut contains leaflets and books with lots of information about Hayling and the surrounding areas.
